options.changeEverySceneDialog: Would you like to change this setting on every scene?

arrowColor.name: Indicator Color
arrowColor.hint: Select a color for the indicator.

arrowDistance.name: Indicator Distance
arrowDistance.hint: Set the multiplier for the indicator's distance. Math: Largest Size Ã— (Multiplier / 2).

combatOnly.name: Hide Indicator While Out Of Combat
combatOnly.hint: Hides the indicator when no combat is active.

hideIndicatorOnDead.name: Hide Indicator On Dead Tokens
hideIndicatorOnDead.hint: Hides the indicator from tokens marked as defeated on the combat tracker (e.g. the big skull marker on most systems).

indicatorDrawingType.name: Indicator Drawing Type
indicatorDrawingType.hint: Changes how the indicator is drawn.

lockArrowToFace.name: Snap Token to Closest Tile
lockArrowToFace.hint: Snaps the token's rotation to the closest tile it would be facing instead of the direction of the movement's angle.

enable-indicator.name: NPC Token Indicators
enable-indicator.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to NPC tokens.

enable-indicator-pc.name: PC Token Indicators
enable-indicator-pc.hint: Adds an indicator for direction to player-controlled tokens.

flip-or-rotate.name: Token Mirroring
flip-or-rotate.hint: Sets if tokens should be mirrored horizontally, vertically or not at all.

facing-direction.name: Default Facing Direction
facing-direction.hint: The default direction tokens are facing.
